description:
Keynote
.. PyCon UK 2018
  
Assembly Room 2018-09-16 09:30-10:30
  
On Tuesday joining us will be Nikoleta E. Glynatsi, who uses Python and maths to unpick the secrets of the forces that maintain the relationships between things in the world. Nikoleta is a doctoral student in mathematics at Cardiff University.
title: Tuesday Keynote - Nikoleta E. Glynatsi
